item.description: PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD If you are a registered Democrat in New Hampshire, you MUST register Republican or Undeclared by Friday, October 14, 2011 in order to vote for Ron Paul in the 2012 Presidential Primary. Undeclared voters can vote in the Republican primary. You can check your registration by calling your local city or town clerk. Contact info here: http://www.sos.nh.gov... If you are a registered Democrat, you can register Republican or Undeclared at your local city or town clerk.
item.name: Deadline to register to vote for Ron Paul
